metadata.title: CVE-2022-31612 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows contains a vulnerability in thekernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) handler for DxgkDdiEscape, where a localuser with basic capabilities can cause an out-of-bounds read, which maylead to a system crash or a leak of internal kernel information.
